{"id":536226058,"lang":"cpp","time":"3 months, 1 week","timestamp":1628589668,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/536226058/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome","memory":"7.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isPalindrome(string s) {\n      \n        \n        if(s==\"\")\n            return false;\n           \n      \n        int a=0;\n        int b=s.length()-1;\n       \n        while(a<=b)\n        {\n            char ch1=s[a];\n            char ch2=s[b];\n            \n            if(!isalnum(ch1))\n            {\n                a++;\n                \n            }\n            else if(!isalnum(ch2))\n            {\n                b--;\n            }\n            else if(tolower(ch1)!=tolower(ch2))\n                return false;\n            else\n            {\n                a++;\n                b--;\n            }\n        }\n       return true;\n        /*\n        if(rev==str)\n            return true;\n        else\n            return false;\n            */\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome"}
